titleStmt.title: Annotations upon some difficult texts in all the books of the New Testament by Sr. Norton Knatchbull ...
Animadversiones in libros Novi Testamenti. English
titleStmt.author: Knatchbull, Norton, Sir, 1602-1685.
J. L.
Walker, Thomas, 1658 or 9-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Hayes ..., for W. Graves ...,

notesStmt.note: "An encomiastick upon the most learned and judicious author of these critical annotations" signed: Tho. Walker.
Translation of the author's Animadversiones in libros Novi Testamenti.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
